articles.title: Lakhimpur, Where Farmers Were Run Over, Among 59 UP Seats Voting Today
articles.description: Voting will be held in 59 constituencies of Uttar Pradesh, including state capital Lucknow and Lakhimpur Kheri, today in the fourth phase of assembly polls in Uttar Pradesh. Five seats under Raebareli, the bastion of Sonia Gandhi, will also vote.
articles.content:
• The seats are spread across the districts of Pilibhit, Lakhimpur Kheri, Sitapur, Hardoi, Unnao, Lucknow, Rae Bareli, Banda, and Fatehpur.

articles.description: India reported a total of 13,405 new COVID-19 cases on Tuesday, taking the virus tally to over 4.28 crore cases. According to Ministry of Health and Family Welfare, the number of active cases has fallen below two lakh after 49 days.
